scenario.name: UAC
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[field0]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[field1]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: [field0] <sip:[field0]@[field1]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 INVITE Alert-Info: <http://127.0.0.1/Bellcore-dr5> Contact: sip:sipp@[field1] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 0 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000

BYE sip:[field0]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[field1]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: [field0] <sip:[field0]@[field1]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 2 BYE Contact: sip:sipp@[field1] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Length: 0
